author: Brandjuh
description: Scrapes alliance building data from MissionChief USA. Tracks all stations with classroom counts, building types, and ownership for growth analysis.
install_msg:
✅ Buildings Scraper installed!

Use `[p]load buildingsscraper` to enable.

Commands (owner only):
• `[p]scrape_buildings` - Manual scrape

Automatic scraping runs every hour at :45

Database: scraper_databases/buildings.db
Fields: building_id, owner, type, location, classrooms, status, level, timestamp
short: Alliance buildings tracker with classroom and growth monitoring
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores scraped MissionChief building data in a local SQLite database.
